data.text: Ei misîr lâia abipuitak chu mahi ani, Ochai Inlaltak invâna Rêng Inchungtak rêngsukmun changtienga hong insung ei dôn ani. 8:1: Lap 110:1
Miriem kutsin niloi, Pumapa sin puon-in tatak Mun Inthieng taka Ochai Inlaltak angin sin a tho ani.
Ochai Inlaltak ngei murdi'n neinunpêk le sa inbôlna Pathien kôma pêk rangin phun an nia, Masikin ei Ochai Inlaltak khom hin imini chu pêk rang a dôn ngêt rang anâng ani.
Ama hah pilchunga om senla chu, ama chu ochai reng ni tet no nih, Juda Balama neinunpêk anâng ngei pêk ngâi ochaingei an om sikin.

Ochaingei sintho ngâi hah chu invâna neinunngei rimil le rilîm tatak vaike ani. Moses'n Chonginkhitna Puon-in a sin rang lâia phuozekin Pathien'n a kôm, “Ni sin rang tie chu muola a rimil min mua no om ngei angtakin sin rangin mindon roh,” tia a ril anghan.8:5: Jôk 25:40

Aniatachu, atûn chu, anni ngei nêka ânchung uol ochai sin hah Jisua pêkin a om zoi, Pathien le a mingei kâra chonginkhit a minsûk hah asa uola, ma chonginkhâm hah neinun asa uol ngeia minding ani sikin.
Chonginkhitna masa hah dikloina om no senla chu, a inik changna hah hong om rang nâng no nih.
Aniatachu Pathien'n a mingei dikloina a man lâihan a tia, 8:8-12: Jer 31:31-34 (LXX)
An richibulngei Egypt renga hong tuong ngei ranga
Atûn, nikhuo hong tung rang ngeia Israel mingei leh chonginkhit ki sin rang chu
Tutên, ‘Pumapa hah riet roh,’ tiin an miriem champui mini aninônchu
Chonginkhit thar a ti sikin, Pathien'n amotona ha chu a muruon a sin zoi; male neinuntin amuruo hong changa mangsaloi ngei chu inmang lai atih zoi.
